title: in veigs Christmas skin his q makes the normal skins sound
body: when i q as veig with his Christmas skin his q doesn't make that box smashing sound it makes his regular skins sound for his q though his w sound does work

replies.body:
Hey XxDarkDespairxX! 

Thanks for the report! 

This may have happened when we changed how Veigar's Q worked. We'll get this fixed!
OH IT WORKS NOW JUST TRIED IT IN CUSTOM THANK YOU SO MUCH I CAN PLAY HIM AGAIN! I LOVE THAT BOX SMASHING SOUND ITS SO SATISFYING
I'm pretty sure Leprechaun Veigar also had an unique particle for Q that is now missing.
